articles.description: Real Madrid forward Vinicius Jr scored twice as Brazil beat Paraguay 4-1 at the Copa America.
articles.title: Brazil 4-1 Paraguay: Vinicius Jr scores twice to get Copa America campaign up and running

articles.description: Manchester United confirm the exit of goalkeeper Mary Earps as she prepares for a move to French club Paris St-Germain.

articles.description: This season could not have gone much better for Granit Xhaka and now is the perfect opportunity to lead his country to Euro 2024 success.
